##### FILE: canary6_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Service/canary-demo-preview:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Service
metadata:
  name: canary-demo-preview
  namespace: default
spec:
  ports:
  - name: http
    port: 8178
    protocol: TCP
    targetPort: 8080
  selector:
    app: canary-demo
  type: ClusterIP

---

##### FILE: canary6_3.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Ingress/canary-demo:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: Ingress
metadata:
  annotations:
    ingress.kubernetes.io/app-root: /
    ingress.kubernetes.io/proxy-body-size: 100M
    kubernetes.io/ingress.class: nginx
  name: canary-demo
  namespace: default
spec:
  rules:
  - host: arsene.com
    http:
      paths:
      - backend:
          service:
            name: canary-demo
            port:
              number: 8178
        path: /
        pathType: ImplementationSpecific

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
pass: 1, fail: 0, warn: 0, error: 0, skip: 0

##### FILE: canaryDeployment.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mydeployments-stable:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: mydeployments-stable
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      name: deployment
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        name: deployment
      name: testpod
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: amiyaranjansahoo/myapp:v1
        name: myapl
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080

---

skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource default/Deployment/mydeployments-stable

skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource default/Deployment/mydeployments-stable
policy disallow-default-namespace -> resource default/Deployment/mydeployments-stable failed:
1 - validate-podcontroller-namespace validation error: Using 'default' namespace is not allowed for pod controllers. rule validate-podcontroller-namespace failed at path /metadata/namespace/

policy drop-all-capabilities -> resource default/Deployment/mydeployments-stable failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-all validation failure: Containers must drop `ALL` capabilities.

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource default/Deployment/mydeployments-stable failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

policy require-labels -> resource default/Deployment/mydeployments-stable failed:
1 - autogen-check-for-labels validation error: The label `app.kubernetes.io/name` is required. rule autogen-check-for-labels failed at path /spec/template/metadata/labels/app.kubernetes.io/name/

policy require-requests-limits -> resource default/Deployment/mydeployments-stable failed:
1 - autogen-validate-resources validation error: CPU and memory resource requests and memory limits are required for containers. rule autogen-validate-resources failed at path /spec/template/spec/containers/0/resources/

policy require-pod-probes -> resource default/Deployment/mydeployments-stable failed:
1 - autogen-validate-probes validation failure: Liveness, readiness, or startup probes are required for all containers.

policy require-ro-rootfs -> resource default/Deployment/mydeployments-stable failed:
1 - autogen-validate-readOnlyRootFilesystem validation error: Root filesystem must be read-only. rule autogen-validate-readOnlyRootFilesystem failed at path /spec/template/spec/containers/0/securityContext/

policy restrict-image-registries -> resource default/Deployment/mydeployments-stable failed:
1 - autogen-validate-registries validation error: Unknown image registry. rule autogen-validate-registries failed at path /spec/template/spec/containers/0/image/

##### FILE: canary-v1-deployment.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/canary-demo-v1-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: canary-demo
  name: canary-demo-v1-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: canary-demo
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: canary-demo
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: canary-demo-v1
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 50m
            memory: 400Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 150Mi
      restartPolicy: Always

---

##### FILE: canary-v1-deployment2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/canary-demo-v1-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: canary-demo
  name: canary-demo-v1-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: canary-demo
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: canary-demo
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: canary-demo-v1
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 50m
            memory: 400Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 150Mi
      restartPolicy: Always

##### FILE: canary-v2-deployment3.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/canary-demo-v2-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: canary-demo
  name: canary-demo-v2-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: canary-demo
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: canary-demo
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: httpd
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: canary-demo-v2
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 50m
            memory: 400Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 150Mi
      restartPolicy: Always

##### FILE: candidate-service.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/candidate-app:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: candidate-app
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app-label: candidate-app
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app-label: candidate-app
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: job.service.url
          value: http://job-service:8080/jobs/
        envFrom:
        - secretRef:
            name: candidate-db-secrets
        image: ssamantr/candidate-service:1.0.0
        name: candidate-app
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
          name: candidate-port
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /actuator/health
            port: 8080
          periodSeconds: 5
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 2000m
            memory: 2000Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 100Mi
        startupProbe:
          failureThreshold: 35
          httpGet:
            path: /actuator/health
            port: 8080
          periodSeconds: 2

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource default/Deployment/candidate-app

1 - autogen-require-drop-all validation failure: Containers must drop `ALL` capabilities.

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource default/Deployment/candidate-app failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

1 - autogen-check-for-labels validation error: The label `app.kubernetes.io/name` is required. rule autogen-check-for-labels failed at path /spec/template/metadata/labels/app.kubernetes.io/name/

##### FILE: capabilities.yaml #####

apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: privileged1
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: nginx
    name: privileged1
    securityContext:
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - LINUX_IMMUTABLE

---

##### FILE: capabilities_baseline0.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      capabilities:
        add:

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false

        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT

        - AUDIT_WRITE

        - NET_BIND_SERVICE

        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT

apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false

        add:
        - NET_RAW

##### FILE: capabilities_baseline01031.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault

kind: Pod

  namespace: default

  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause

        - ALL

##### FILE: capabilities_baseline01039.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - NET_RAW
        drop:
        - ALL
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault

---

##### FILE: capabilities_baseline01047.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource default/Pod/capabilities_baseline0

##### FILE: capabilities_baseline01048.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      capabilities:
        add:
        - NET_RAW
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      capabilities: {}
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true

---

##### FILE: capabilities_baseline01049.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true

---

kind: Pod

  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT

    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE

        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT

    runAsNonRoot: true

##### FILE: capabilities_baseline0110.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - NET_RAW
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities: {}
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true

---

##### FILE: capabilities_baseline0111.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true

---

##### FILE: capabilities_baseline01188.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      capabilities:
        add:
        - NET_RAW
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      capabilities: {}
  securityContext: {}

---

##### FILE: capabilities_baseline01189.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT
  securityContext: {}

apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod

  name: capabilities_baseline0
  namespace: default

  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT

apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT

    name: initcontainer1

        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER

        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE

        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT

apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:

spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP

        - NET_BIND_SERVICE

        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - NET_RAW
        drop:
        - ALL
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT

  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT

kind: Pod

  namespace: default

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true

kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: k8s.gcr.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT
  initContainers:
  - image: k8s.gcr.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT

##### FILE: capabilities_baseline01270.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - NET_RAW
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities: {}
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true

---

##### FILE: capabilities_baseline01271.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true

---

        - FOWNER

        - KILL
        - MKNOD

        - SETUID

##### FILE: capabilities_baseline01303.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT
  securityContext: {}

    seccompProfile:

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault

  name: capabilities_baseline0
  namespace: default

  containers:
  - image: k8s.gcr.io/pause
    name: container1

kind: Pod

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: k8s.gcr.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      capabilities:
        add:
        - NET_RAW
  initContainers:
  - image: k8s.gcr.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      capabilities: {}
  securityContext: {}

---

apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT

    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:

        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER

        - MKNOD

##### FILE: capabilities_baseline01461.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true

---

##### FILE: capabilities_baseline01469.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE

##### FILE: capabilities_baseline01478.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - NET_RAW
        drop:
        - ALL
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault

---

##### FILE: capabilities_baseline01483.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true

---

      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities: {}
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline0
  namespace: default

  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause

    securityContext:

        add:
        - NET_RAW

    name: initcontainer1

apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT

        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE

        - MKNOD

        - FOWNER

metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true

---

apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:

        - NET_RAW

        - ALL

apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: k8s.gcr.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT
  initContainers:
  - image: k8s.gcr.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT
  securityContext: {}

kind: Pod

        add:

kind: Pod

  name: capabilities_baseline0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      capabilities:
        add:

        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT

        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER

        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE

        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT

        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID

    name: initcontainer1

        - MKNOD

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      capabilities:
        add:
        - NET_RAW
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      capabilities: {}
  securityContext: {}

---

  name: capabilities_baseline0
  namespace: default

  containers:
  - image: k8s.gcr.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      capabilities:
        add:
        - NET_RAW
  initContainers:
  - image: k8s.gcr.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      capabilities: {}
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: k8s.gcr.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP

        - CHOWN

        - NET_BIND_SERVICE

        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT

apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod

  namespace: default

  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause

apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:

  namespace: default

  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:

        - KILL

        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID

        - AUDIT_WRITE

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - NET_RAW
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities: {}
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT
  initContainers:

    name: initcontainer1

      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false

        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true

    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID

        - AUDIT_WRITE

        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE

        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT

##### FILE: capabilities_baseline01701.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - NET_RAW
        drop:
        - ALL
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT

  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT

    runAsNonRoot: true

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: k8s.gcr.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT
  initContainers:
  - image: k8s.gcr.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true

---

kind: Pod

  containers:

        - NET_BIND_SERVICE

        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT

    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/DaemonSet/cap-checker:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: DaemonSet
metadata:
  labels:
    app: cap-checker
  name: cap-checker
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: cap-checker
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: cap-checker
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - sleep infinity
        command:
        - /bin/bash
        - -c
        image: entlein/lightening:0.0.2
        name: cap-checker
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /proc
          name: host-proc
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /host/tmp
          name: host-tmp
      hostPID: true
      serviceAccountName: cap-checker
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /proc
        name: host-proc
      - hostPath:
          path: /tmp
        name: host-tmp
